articles.author: Kari Paul
articles.title: Tucker Carlson breaks silence after abrupt departure from Fox News - The Guardian
articles.description: Former Fox star did not address his reported firing but offered sweeping complaints about the state of American discourse
articles.content:
Tucker Carlson has broken his silence for the first time since his abrupt departure from Fox News, posting a video to Twitter that did not directly address his reported firing.
Carlson was one of th… [+1897 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: Americans stuck in Sudan to make 'life or death decisions' express anger at US government - CNN
articles.description: As the crisis in Sudan continues to unfold, there is mounting anger among Americans who feel abandoned by the US government and left to navigate the complicated and dangerous situation on their own.
articles.content: As the crisis in Sudan continues to unfold, there is mounting anger among Americans who feel abandoned by the US government and left to navigate the complicated and dangerous situation on their own.… [+8114 chars]
